title: janggernaut
author: janggernaut
content: Okay, so all of you must be remembered when Elon tweeted about Doge twitter pic when Halloween day back then, not too long after he bought twitter for $44billion and he tweeted like thisAnd price of dogecoin soaring because of that,The speculation is, Will Elon posted doge pic too along with twitter flag on Chrismast day and make dogecoin price soaring again?Source: Google images

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Do this still matters? It's very risky if you will just make Elon Musk an indicator when you are buying/selling Dogecoin. There are already a lot of bots that are already deployed that are waiting for Elon Musk to tweet something related to cryptocurrency like Dogecoin, and these bots will immediately open a trade. That's why you can see an immediate pump on Dogecoin every time Dogecoin is mentioned by Elon Musk.For me, it's good if you are trading for it just like you buy immediately after he tweeted because you will not know when Elon Musk will tweet about Dogecoin

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: I hope he does that because I already bought dogecoin a few hundred dollars at $0.09, hoping it won't take long to take profit from this purchase and as usual the tweets from him are really helpful and profitable especially for those who have already bought before Elon influenced market with his tweets, but it will be a question with the not so distant timing of the previous tweet whether the market will respond favorably?

comments.author: nara1892
comments.body: Yes, it is undeniable that every time Elon Musk tweets about Dogecoin, it will push up the price of Dogecoin itself. But will we always expect the same thing like that? Yes, maybe this is not a problem when it comes to making money through what Elon Musk tweets. However, we should not depend on this so that we forget about other factors that affect the price itself. The worry is that we are a little late and become FOMO about this, instead of getting our benefit, the opposite is true. Because I'm sure there's a lot of people watching stuff like this, and they're racing to be the first to come in and slam the price.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Still beats me how a single tweet from a man can trigger so much reaction from investors, it is almost like some investors only rely on the comment of influencer people to make their investment decission. Elon is use to messing with investors so it is very likely he will be tweeting about dogecoin soon. Am not sure i am willing to base my investment on tweets, it is already risky enough to invest on alts.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: There's still the sensation that many are following what Elon is going to do through Twitter. His acts are random now if we're going to base them on the crypto market.Yeah, he's a fan of meme coin mostly for Dogecoin but we don't know what he's going to do or post a picture or make it a profile picture. They're all random and we don't know what it will be but for sure that everyone will go to react all of it if he ever does and behind that account and monitor/smartphone, he's surely going to laugh again while looking at the market's reaction.

comments.author: SirLancelot
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on December 22, 2022, 09:05:32 PMStill beats me how a single tweet from a man can trigger so much reaction from investors, it is almost like some investors only rely on the comment of influencer people to make their investment decission. Elon is use to messing with investors so it is very likely he will be tweeting about dogecoin soon. Am not sure i am willing to base my investment on tweets, it is already risky enough to invest on alts. He isn't just a man but the he is Elon Musk. The second richest man in the world if I am not mistaken. A lot of people follow him so it's normal for those people to react for whatever this guy is doing and there are those who just join in for the hypes in hopes of scoring some profit. For a true investor, they can stand on their own feet and they don't depend on some influencers. They also think it's wrong because it was the same as market manipulation which is mostly done by the whales.If you are not sure if what to do then I suggest don't join those people who watch out for the actions of Elon Musk and other influencers. You already said that investing alone is already risky, so why will you elevate that risk?

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Doge holders can only hope. It was already good to see him being a CEO but is stepping down. This is really disappointing for those who speculate recently banking his shilling. Elon still has the biggies influence in Doge which even with just a tweet like that OP's sample might trigger some volumes of buyers. This December however is not as quite positive at all to crypto, unlike the previous years where we see little pumps.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Not care anymore ~XD.Even he already doing this, then just a small up. We're on bearish right now and most of people are gonna to save the money for "Christmast & New Years" some of speculation from the fundamental side.Everytime end of the years, people are always cashout due vacation.

comments.author: sulendra12
comments.body: If he does then you should know what to do then with your money, otherwise just don't bother with it and watch.Actually meme coins like this where the price is so easily rocketed up to its peak because of one single tweet from some influencers are really scary to think about.But if we are in bear market, how Doge even supposed to go up when every altcoins in the market is going down? Who knows what would Elon do when the time come, since his recent tweets are really wild right now lol.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Only Elon Musk have got the answer for this. He's not much into dogecoin for now. Maybe he can push the market all the way, but the bear market will be considered before making a manipulation through his tweets. If it is bull market, then he could've done the market push that takes the market to rise continuously for specific time period. As the market is in its downturn, it can be easily identified as manipulated move.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: won't. I think that at this time Elon musk is getting fed up with Dogecoin because several times he tried to push the price to increase, but his efforts were in vain.I also will never care about anything Elon Musk says on Twitter. because making Elon musk as a motivator for investment is not good.but sometimes no matter what Elon musk says, some people still believe that there will be an increase in the price of Dogecoin.

comments.author: irsykes
comments.body: Seeing the news that Elon Musk has dropped in rank to become the richest person in the world, is a question mark.? what assets he has are being bet on doge even though not all of them. doge always goes up suddenly after twet elon musk acts, is there a failure in the strategy for playing up and down the altcoins he plays. just my speculation

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: irsykes on December 24, 2022, 10:00:28 PMSeeing the news that Elon Musk has dropped in rank to become the richest person in the world, is a question mark.? what assets he has are being bet on doge even though not all of them. doge always goes up suddenly after twet elon musk acts, is there a failure in the strategy for playing up and down the altcoins he plays. just my speculationElon is not tweeting anymore about DOGE though, maybe he realized the shit he is dealing with DOGE and probably being advised not to hype this token anymore because he can still be liable for that. I don’t know why many are being hyped with a simple tweet of Elon, maybe this will not be the trend anymore.

comments.author: pantek talacuik
comments.body: Quote from: Scripture on December 24, 2022, 11:46:27 PMQuote from: irsykes on December 24, 2022, 10:00:28 PMSeeing the news that Elon Musk has dropped in rank to become the richest person in the world, is a question mark.? what assets he has are being bet on doge even though not all of them. doge always goes up suddenly after twet elon musk acts, is there a failure in the strategy for playing up and down the altcoins he plays. just my speculationElon is not tweeting anymore about DOGE though, maybe he realized the shit he is dealing with DOGE and probably being advised not to hype this token anymore because he can still be liable for that. I don’t know why many are being hyped with a simple tweet of Elon, maybe this will not be the trend anymore. It can be concluded that Elon's words were just a coincidence that made people surprised by all of this. So you should look for things and new ways to get what you want. Everything will be heavy if you continue to believe it. he isn't god.

comments.author: irsykes
comments.body: Quote from: ibuddy122505 on December 25, 2022, 05:10:18 AMQuote from: Scripture on December 24, 2022, 11:46:27 PMQuote from: irsykes on December 24, 2022, 10:00:28 PMSeeing the news that Elon Musk has dropped in rank to become the richest person in the world, is a question mark.? what assets he has are being bet on doge even though not all of them. doge always goes up suddenly after twet elon musk acts, is there a failure in the strategy for playing up and down the altcoins he plays. just my speculationElon is not tweeting anymore about DOGE though, maybe he realized the shit he is dealing with DOGE and probably being advised not to hype this token anymore because he can still be liable for that. I don’t know why many are being hyped with a simple tweet of Elon, maybe this will not be the trend anymore. DOGE is not the only topic Elon tweets about. Elon's tweets, however, should not be used to make investment decisions solely based on them. It is better to do some research and consider a variety of factors before investing. Beware of potential risks and uncertainties now that the hype is over.The reason is that many people who follow believe Elon Musk's tweets, which are increasingly here, only trapped in minus assets. people will be aware from here because this will destroy him, just for following the tweet. big lessons are not a guarantee for something that looks big doesn't necessarily produce results

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.created_time: December 25, 2022, 11:59:09 PMLast edit: December 26, 2022, 12:10:08 AM by AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: irsykes on December 25, 2022, 01:57:49 PMQuote from: ibuddy122505 on December 25, 2022, 05:10:18 AMQuote from: Scripture on December 24, 2022, 11:46:27 PMQuote from: irsykes on December 24, 2022, 10:00:28 PMSeeing the news that Elon Musk has dropped in rank to become the richest person in the world, is a question mark.? what assets he has are being bet on doge even though not all of them. doge always goes up suddenly after twet elon musk acts, is there a failure in the strategy for playing up and down the altcoins he plays. just my speculationElon is not tweeting anymore about DOGE though, maybe he realized the shit he is dealing with DOGE and probably being advised not to hype this token anymore because he can still be liable for that. I don’t know why many are being hyped with a simple tweet of Elon, maybe this will not be the trend anymore. DOGE is not the only topic Elon tweets about. Elon's tweets, however, should not be used to make investment decisions solely based on them. It is better to do some research and consider a variety of factors before investing. Beware of potential risks and uncertainties now that the hype is over.The reason is that many people who follow believe Elon Musk's tweets, which are increasingly here, only trapped in minus assets. people will be aware from here because this will destroy him, just for following the tweet. big lessons are not a guarantee for something that looks big doesn't necessarily produce resultswe are now seeing the decline of the popularity of elon's tweets. maybe before, one tweet, and we had seen the price of doge went up. but now, i think, a lot of these followers are weighing their decisions already. they are now finding out that tweet alone won't sustain the high price of doge. but actual accomplishments. some are still following him as they are hoping that one day they will recover their losses from this investment.

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Yup he uploaded it,But unfortunately thats doesn't make any big change with dogeecoin and other dog coins by his tweet. It seems people are started moving to NFTs and doesn't care much about any dog coins since they got attracted by people who flex their earnings from NFTs

comments.author: onecall123
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on December 26, 2022, 12:52:38 AMYup he uploaded it,But unfortunately thats doesn't make any big change with dogeecoin and other dog coins by his tweet. It seems people are started moving to NFTs and doesn't care much about any dog coins since they got attracted by people who flex their earnings from NFTsIt's obvious he posted it, but his dogs are happier than us. In the coming year, things should be better. It is true that Elon Musk's tweets temporarily affected Dogecoin's price, however, he does not seem to be the primary driver at the moment.I wish Elon and Doggos a very Merry Christmas!

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: janggernaut on December 26, 2022, 12:52:38 AMBut unfortunately thats doesn't make any big change with dogeecoin and other dog coins by his tweet. It seems people are started moving to NFTs and doesn't care much about any dog coins since they got attracted by people who flex their earnings from NFTsIt's because everyone has got enough of it already. There's no need for people that still ditch on his hype but it seems that there's no hype he's bringing with that tweet.It is that most people are sensational with every tweet he make and on that photo, a dog and a santa hat, well, there's some hint but good thing that the market didn't reacted that lot.
